unnormalised: Arre, another circular asking us to address the Block Development Officer as "Shri" B.D.O. Kumar? As if "BDO saab" wasn't already formal enough! Now even chai at the panchayat office will feel like a UPSC interview.
normalised: Arre, another circular asking us to address the Block Development Officer as "Shri" B-D-O. Kumar? As if "B-D-O saab" wasn't already formal enough! Now even chai at the panchayat office will feel like a U-P-S-C interview.
